price: نو كله چې زموږ څرګندې نښانې هغوى ته ورغلې، وېلې دا خو ښكاره كوډې دي.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡهُمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا مُبۡصِرَةٗ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāathum āyātunā mub'ṣiratan qālū hādhā siḥ'run mubīnun
